tool_description: Introducing GeoSource API - the comprehensive API service that provides a wealth of geo-information on countries, states, cities, zip codes, currencies, flags, and much more. With GeoSource API, developers can easily access accurate and up-to-date geo-information to enhance their applications and services.
title: GeoSource API

api_list.name: Capital By Country
api_list.description: Retrives a value of the capital of the country.

api_list.name: Phone Code By Country
api_list.description: Retrives a Phone code of the country.

api_list.name: emoji Flag By Country
api_list.description: Retrives  the emoji flag code of the country.

api_list.name: Location By City
api_list.description: Retrives  the lat and lng of the city.

api_list.name: ZipCode By City
api_list.description: Retrives the zip code/codes of the city ( must be in the supported countries list [ 44 countries ]).

api_list.name: cities By State
api_list.description: Retrives a list of  cities of the state.

api_list.name: states By Country
api_list.description: Retrives a list of all states of the country.

api_list.name: Currency By Country
api_list.description: Retrives a currecny and currency symbol of the country

api_list.name: CountriesList
api_list.description: Retrives a list of all countries and some basic information of them
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geosource-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geosource-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
